I made an "Official" gun sight for my squadron =Noi= Fighting Falcons.

We are a squadron that plays squadron battles in a competitve manner, if you are interested in a competitive mode gaijin forgot about and most don't even know exists... dap me up!

"We Prey, They Pray!"

#noi #sqbs

BF2 Sights

相同倍率可通用的瞄具，请不要把它放进all_tanks里面
Same magnification universal . Please do not put it in all_tanks

用的时候，请注意对照检查炮手瞄准镜缩放倍率。
When using, please pay attention to checking the magnification of the gunner's sight

Example :
· Lav25 (4.0x-12.0x) - LavAD M3A3...
· Type98（8.0x) - ZTZ96 T-72A/B M60...
· PGZ04A(2.0x-6.0x）- PGZ04A...
· T90(2.7x-12.0x）- T-90A...
· M1A2(3.0x-10.0x) - M1 M1A1/A2/SEP...
· WZ551(6.0x-11.0x） - ZBD04A...
· BTR-90A(2.7x-12.0x) - BMP2M BMP3 BMD4...

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\commo...

Universal Hellcat sight by Daebom

#anime #universal_sight #universal #sight #daebom #hellcat

My version of a rather clean sight for the Turm 3. I've added some texts here and there for the cool factor and the line for aiming the 30mil which obscures the view more than it helps aiming BUT i find it cool.

(China) Historical and Semi-Historical Gun Reticles Sights - V0.1.1

★★★All the credits to @RideR2, for being the original creator; I'm just fixing and continuing his superb mod★★★

Installation:
Extract and drop the blk files. UserSights/all_tanks

~HISTORICAL BKAN 1C SIGHT~
4k, 1440p and 1080p

Realistic Bkan 1 sight with correct FOV (10°). There's not much more to say on this one.

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=sharing

.BLK name format:
R - Rastmust
BKAN - short for Bandkanon
h - historical (historical FOV + other stuff)
sh - semi-historical (default FOV)
1080p/1440p/4k - resolution

Vote on my suggestions for better sights:

--> https://forum.warthunder.com/t/multiple-sights-for-one-vehicle/60233 <--
--> htt...

Kurumi Tokisaki Universal Sight(Modified ver.)
Works with All vehicles

It is made based on the anime 'Date a Live' character Kurumi Tokisaki

[changes]
* The size of the character drawing has been subdivided into very big, big, middle, and small
- very big: Based on 1.9x sight
- big: Based on 4.0x sight
- middle: Based on 6.0x sight
- small: Based on 8.0x sight

I recommend using the right size for you after applying all sizes.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please leave a post comment.
Thank y...

Universal Low Velocity Sight

Heightfinder apply to ~2.5m tank

You need to bind "Crosshair Lighting" to change color or edit //Color setting in .blk

#universal
